backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two CelebrationView-related fix and error-handling features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining Valentine-themed OKLCH variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and setting the themed page title.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component toggling between ValentineProposal and CelebrationView with floating hearts and footer.
Animated celebration screen showing messages, meme image, and an uploaded photo with error handling.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHeartsOv: Generates randomly positioned floating heart icons for a decorative overlay.
frontend/src/components/ValentineProposa: Proposal UI with Yes/No buttons where No evasively moves and shows rotating cute prompts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and refreshing an authenticated or anonymous IC actor via React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvasiveNoButton.ts: Hook computing random safe viewport positions for the evasive No button while avoiding the Yes button.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading stored identities, login flow, and status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, custom Valentine-themed color variables, global styles, and animation utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, typography, and extended theme settings using CSS variables.
project_state.json: Describes the projectâ€™s Valentine proposal site goals, existing features, issues, and architectural notes for build planning.
